title: What makes a research paper low-quality? - Quora

response.answer_text: The quality of a research paper can be poor if the following factors are lacking in the study : (1) inadequate comprehensive state of art of the study, (2) poor grammatical exoression , (3). absence of novel investigation of the problem. (4) impatience on the part of the researcers during the research and write-up, (5) if the. paper is not adequately contributing to the body of the existing knowledge O. D. Sam

Hello! Usually, a research paper of poor quality has a poor grammar expression and inequality between the research paper’s topic and the content. It is where it is easy to see that the author doesn't have enough knowledge to write a paper. Also, papers of this kind usually contain a lot of plagiarism and have no novelty and value at all.
